price: 15਼ ਕਿਉਂ ਨਹੀਂ (ਜਾਵੇਗਾ), ਉਸ ਦਾ ਰੱਬ ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਵੇਖ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ।
arabic: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: balā inna rabbahu kāna bihi baṣīran
